DOC.brief_title: Effect LEO 39652 Cream Adults With Mild Moderate Atopic Dermatitis ( AD )
DOC.criteria: Subjects Atopic Dermatitis ( AD ) define Hanifin Rajka criterion mild moderate disease severity ( IGA 2 3 ) Two symmetrical comparable Entire Treatment Areas , body region ( leave right part ) Subjects must good health Female subject childbearing potential male subject must willing consent use high effective method contraception Any condition treatment area opinion investigator could interfere clinical assessment , e.g . acne , infection , rash ( atopic dermatitis ) , sunburn , hyperor hypopigmentation , scar Darkskinned person ( i.e . skin type IV VI accord Fitzpatrick classification system ) whose skin colour prevents reliable clinical assessment Any permanent ( transient within 28 day prior dose ) disease ( particular cardiac disease heart failure history myocardial infarction ) may interfere subject safe participation trial , subject ability participate trial clinical assessment Subjects congenital acquire immunodeficiency subject therapy cause immunosuppression
